hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "One should not prevent others from watering their animals with the surplus of his water in order to prevent them from benefiting by the surplus of grass

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنَ الاِحْتِيَالِ فِي الْبُيُوعِ
chapter.eng-name: What tricks are disliked in bargains
